# speck

Indexer for Polkadot Asset Hub nfts provided by Koda


# Code generated uising StrawberryShake

Youtube tutorial: https://youtu.be/fPzqxf3s3DQ?si=mE08shFFo4aoiVzj

Docs: https://chillicream.com/docs/strawberryshake/v13/get-started

## Update the GraphQL schema to the newest version

```
dotnet graphql update
```
